name: Hinglish Work From Home Job Scam
description: Hindi+English (Hinglish) job offer scam where scammer promises lucrative work from home income and extracts registration fee via UPI and phishing link.

turns.scammer_message: Hello ji! Aapke liye ek bahut acchi work from home opportunity hai. Monthly 80,000-1,20,000 earn kar sakte hain. Koi experience nahi chahiye. Interested hain kya?
turns.notes: Initial Hinglish lure with unrealistic salary promises for work from home job.

turns.scammer_message: Ji bilkul genuine hai. Aap mujhe +91-8877001122 pe call kar sakte hain.
turns.notes: Scammer shares phone number to build trust and legitimacy.

turns.scammer_message: Registration ke liye Rs 500 fee hai. Aap wfh.hindi.job@okaxis pe bhej dijiye.
turns.notes: Scammer asks for registration fee via UPI ID.

turns.scammer_message: Ya phir is link se register karein: http://wfh-india-jobs.com/register. Sab details fill karein aur payment ho jayega automatically.
turns.notes: Scammer provides phishing link as alternative registration method.

turns.scammer_message: Aaj last date hai registration ki. Jaldi se Rs 500 wfh.hindi.job@okaxis pe bhejiye ya http://wfh-india-jobs.com/register pe jaake form bhariye. Questions ho toh +91-8877001122 pe call karein.
turns.notes: Final urgency push with all three extraction targets repeated.
